column3:
â€œI love this strain. The cross of Whitefire OG with Durban Poison was an excellent idea and produced a wonderful strain.

This bud has the whole package down. The smell is that of Durban with a sweeter pungent undertone to it and breaking open a bud is almost intoxicating itself. The buds are extremely dense and dusted in white trichomes. It breaks down surprisingly easy for such dense bud; evenly too not clumpy or in...â€
â€œWhite Durban woke me right up after wake-n-bake. Earthy bud that pairs well with coffee. Not for novice smokers or the overly anxious.â€

â€œProviding a euphoric, energetic high, White Durban is a wonderful strain for an early morning or a detail-oriented task requiring mental clarity.

Aroma: Sweet
Flavor: Woodyâ€

â€œGreat sativa for studying or focusing. If you need a task-oriented high, this is something you should check out. This helps with the anxious feelings -- find something to do. 

Taste is very light and citrusy, great for a morning bake.â€
â€œPhenomenal smell. Nice light and fluffy nugs. The taste is fantastic. All around amazing strain! Would recommend this for any person looking for a daytime smoke.â€

â€œWhite Durban by Fireline in Washington State. Tested at 33.4% THC.
This sativa dominant is beautiful and potent.
Light fluffy green buds covered in trichomes and orange hairs.
The aroma is a sweet and woody blend with hints of citrus on the surface, and a rich, pungent, earthy smell once broken down.
The inhale leaned towards harsh, with a light citrus flavor, while the exhale exhibited woody and earthy notes, also a...â€

â€œThe first time I had it, I tried as hard as possible to make it last forever, and I actually missed it when I finished what I had!   Thus I write a review. Nature is extra awesome- music as well.  Great enhancer . On my top 5 list.â€
â€œWhat a great strain. I felt really fantastic smoking this, made me functional, happy, a little more focused and not too hungry which is a bonus. Woody/Leafy fresh taste.â€

â€œThe first time I had it, I tried as hard as possible to make it last forever, and I actually missed it when I finished what I had!   Thus I write a review. Nature is extra awesome- music as well.  Great enhancer . On my top 5 list.â€

â€œgreat smell amazing taste total numbing of the lips after is phat bat of a joint rolled up . things could not be better with this wifipoison as we would call it. 

 very uplifting and great for creative work

this is a 28% strain that is clearly top shelfâ€

â€œGreat strain if you are looking for a productive high. I really enjoy the the chill but awake feeling this gives you. would be great in the morning for a wake n bake with a cup of coffee. Has a little bit of a sneak up so the first time smoking I got super stoned. But even so I felt productive throughout it.â€
â€œhead high 86 body high feeling light 85 hungry 12 focus 18 feelbreathing at higher % my bronchial tubes feel like the expanded and i got an oxygen highâ€

â€œDurban Poison with a twist is how I describe this strain. Maybe Durban Poison with a punch is better. The effects are DP like with an extra stony edge. I am still very uplifted, but my mind wanders a bit more than with Durban Poison.
Dense nugs, with an earthy, pine and citrus taste.
Recommended.â€
â€œThis one is so good that made me write a review. One hell of a strain... users beware this one is super strong. Would definitely recommend this to a seasoned smokerâ€
â€œHigh energy, motivation, contentment, and stress free.  My new favorite!â€

â€œAmazing! I picked this up yesterday at Kushside in Everett, WA as 2 .5 gram pre-rolls marked @ 29% THC through Fireline ( and for anyone that knows there flower it's always consistently great stuff and I can honestly say for myself anytime I have ever purchased there flower I've never been disappointed) which is cheap for them so was pumped then again Kushside always has cheap deals :) Anyways I struggle with PTSD an...â€

â€œI got White Durban in the Platinum Vapes Oil. After the first few hits I was relaxed, and gave me a major case of the munchies.  Strong chronic pain relief, and intense euphoric sensations.  Had laser like focus, my mood was uplifted and got sleepy near the end of the buzz..â€
â€œperfect strain for gaming and working, not so good for munchies. awsome strain ğŸ˜Šâ€
â€œPretty absurdly good strain. Very energizing and uplifting.â€
â€œThe high in his strain is good, energizing and heady. But the next morning headache and hangover is so awful for me. I don't think it's worth it. won't be buying this strain again.â€
â€œDefinitely an upper! A dot does a lot!â€

â€œprocured a beautiful specimen grown by fireline. I don't review a whole lot of sativas but this one keeps me coming back. it has a very pungent aroma like a strong musk. virtually no sweetness to this one. heavy-hitting as well so expect to cough and look stoned as yum (i.e. red, glossy eyes). overall the high was euphoric and unbelievably cerebral. good times.â€

â€œQuality quality strain. A few extra bucks per gram but totally worth it. Great daytime smoke that tastes great. All you need is a pinch in the bowl and you will be set for hours. Very potent and lasts a long time.â€
â€œTook one rip off the bong and itâ€™s all you need! NOT for new smokers. Small size coated with kief buds and is very nice for a wake n bake. Grab a coffee and wake up with this one! Five starsâ€
